ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer aimed at anyone he could, in this case, Diskus. Hands up Maximal, come to me and maybe you ll live! Burning Hammer said. Diskus slowly came

Burning Hammer aimed at anyone he could, in this case, Diskus.

"Hands up Maximal, come to me and maybe you'll live!" Burning Hammer said.
Diskus slowly came closer. Burning Hammer grabbed him by the neck from
behind and wrenched at his neck.

"Don't lose your head, only doing my job!" Burning Hammer said. Stranato and
Inzola exchanged shots with Stronghold and Blender. Serge came up behind,
transforming to T-Rex mode and snapping up Inzola in his jaws. Stranato
turned around and was grabbed by Stronghold and Blender put his saw to
Stranato's throat. Rizopas put his gun to Burning Hammer's head.

"You don't scare me, Maximal!" Burnign Hammer said. Rizopas gasped.

"One on one battle, let's go!" Rizopas challenged Burning Hammer.

"Stop firing Alliance and Preds are Serge has Inzola for desert and Blender
cuts into this one!" Stronghold said, holding Stranato up in a Bearhug
around his arms...
